```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(grf)
library(ggforce)

# source('predict_fn.R')
data_full <- readRDS('data.rds')
set.seed(30)
```

```{r}
X <- data_full$X
Y <- data_full$Y
W <- data_full$W
weights <- data_full$weights
w_hat <- data_full$What
y_hat <- data_full$Yhat
X_id <- data_full$Xid
```

```{r}

# 10000 tree causal forest for benchmark
t100000 <- causal_forest(X, 
                         Y, 
                         W,
                         Y.hat = y_hat,
                         W.hat = w_hat,
                         sample.weights = weights,
                         num.trees = 100000)

# 10000 tree causal forest for benchmark

                         W.hat = w_hat,

# 100 tree causal forest
t100 <- causal_forest(X,

```

```{r}
losses <- data.frame(
  t10000 = (t100000$prediction - t10000$predictions) / t100000$prediction,
  t1000 = (t100000$prediction - t1000$predictions) / t100000$prediction,
  t100 = (t100000$prediction - t100$predictions) / t100000$prediction,
  t10 = (t100000$prediction - t10$predictions) / t100000$prediction,
  t1 = (t100000$prediction - t1$predictions) / t100000$prediction
)
```

```{r}
losses %>%
  mutate_all(abs) %>%
  gather("Number of trees", "Absolute loss") %>%
  mutate(`Number of trees` = factor(`Number of trees`,
                                    levels = c("t1", "t10", "t100", "t1000", "t10000"),
                                    labels = c("1", "10", "100", "1000", "10000"))) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = `Number of trees`, y = `Absolute loss`)) +
    geom_jitter(alpha = 0.2) +
    stat_summary(fun=mean, geom="line", aes(group=1), color ="red", size=2) +
    facet_zoom(ylim = c(0, 0.5))

ggsave('loss_graph.png')
```

```{r}
library(ggforce)
```

## Nusiance Rashomon

```{r}
# Identifying models
# y_hat100000 = regression_forest(X, Y%>% missMethods::impute_median() %>% pull(), num.trees = 100000)
# w_hat100000 = regression_forest(X, W%>% missMethods::impute_median() %>% pull(), num.trees = 100000)

y_hat10000 = regression_forest(X, Y, num.trees = 10000, honesty = FALSE)
w_hat10000 = regression_forest(X, W, num.trees = 10000, honesty = FALSE)

y_hat1000 = regression_forest(X, Y, num.trees = 1000, honesty = FALSE)
w_hat1000 = regression_forest(X, W, num.trees = 1000, honesty = FALSE)

y_hat100 = regression_forest(X, Y, num.trees = 100, honesty = FALSE)
w_hat100 = regression_forest(X, W, num.trees = 100, honesty = FALSE)

y_hat10 = regression_forest(X, Y, num.trees = 10, honesty = FALSE)
w_hat10 = regression_forest(X, W, num.trees = 10, honesty = FALSE)

y_hat1 = regression_forest(X, Y, num.trees = 1, ci.group.size = 1, honesty = FALSE)
w_hat1 = regression_forest(X, W, num.trees = 1, ci.group.size = 1, honesty = FALSE)
```

```{r}

# 10000 tree causal forest for benchmark
# n100000 <- causal_forest(X,
#                          Y %>% missMethods::impute_median() %>% pull(),
#                          W %>% missMethods::impute_median() %>% pull,
#                          Y.hat = y_hat100000$predictions %>% unlist(),
#                          W.hat = w_hat100000$predictions %>% unlist(),
#                          sample.weights = data_s$uhhwte,
#                          num.trees = 10000)

# 10000 tree causal forest for benchmark
n10000 <- causal_forest(X, 
                         Y, 
                         W,
                         Y.hat = predict(y_hat10000, X)$predictions,
                         W.hat = predict(w_hat10000, X)$predictions,
                         sample.weights = weights,
                         num.trees = 10000)

# 1000 tree causal forest
n1000 <- causal_forest(X, 
                         Y, 
                         W,
                         Y.hat = predict(y_hat1000, X)$predictions,
                         W.hat = predict(w_hat1000, X)$predictions,
                         sample.weights = weights,
                         num.trees = 10000)

# 100 tree causal forest
n100 <- causal_forest(X, 
                         Y, 
                         W,
                         Y.hat = predict(y_hat100, X)$predictions,
                         W.hat = predict(w_hat100, X)$predictions,
                         sample.weights = weights,
                         num.trees = 10000)

# 10 tree causal forest
n10 <- causal_forest(X, 
                         Y, 
                         W,
                         Y.hat = predict(y_hat10, X)$predictions,
                         W.hat = predict(w_hat10, X)$predictions,
                         sample.weights = weights,
                         num.trees = 10000)

# 2 tree causal forest
n1 <- causal_forest(X, 
                         Y, 
                         W,
                         Y.hat = predict(y_hat1, X)$predictions,
                         W.hat = predict(w_hat1, X)$predictions,
                         sample.weights = weights,
                         num.trees = 10000)

```

```{r}
losses_n <- data.frame(
  t1000 = n10000$predictions - n1000$predictions,
  t100 = n10000$predictions - n100$predictions,
  t10 = n10000$predictions - n10$predictions,
  t1 = n10000$predictions - n1$predictions)
```

```{r}
losses_n %>%
  mutate_all(abs) %>%
  gather("Number of trees", "Absolute loss") %>%
  mutate(`Number of trees` = factor(`Number of trees`,
                                    levels = c("t1", "t10", "t100", "t1000"),
                                    labels = c("1", "10", "100", "1000"))) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = `Number of trees`, y = `Absolute loss`)) +
    geom_jitter(alpha = 0.2) +
    stat_summary(fun=mean, geom="line", aes(group=1), color ="red", size=2)

ggsave('loss_graph_n.png')
```
